text: @realDonaldTrump Still dropping and like everyone is saying now it's going to be hard for you to make a come back before election day . Plus you don't want us to see the covid19 numbers because you know it's real and want to keep the numbers hidden because you think it will help your numbers

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
